fr.iutvalence.java.mp.epicbattle

Class Battle

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.java.mp.epicbattle.Battle

  • public class Battle
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a new game. It is compounded a table of two players.
    Author:
    GERLAND KAYRAK

      OutputInterface outBattle,

      OutputInterface outP2,
      InputInterface inP1,
      InputInterface inP2)
        This constructor creates a battle between two players. It also assigns a hero to each players.
        Parameters:
        name1 - Name of the first player
        hero1 - His hero
        listWarriors1 - The warriors he chose
        name2 - Name of the second player
        hero2 - His heros
        listWarriors2 - The warriors he chose
        outBattle - The output of the battle
        outP1 - The output of the player1
        outP2 - The output of the player2
        inP1 - The input of the player1
        inP2 - The input of the player2
